articles.author: Alice Scarsi
articles.title: VE Day panic: How Queen and royals sparked 'terror among court' with balcony appearance - Express
articles.description: THE Queen and her family sparked terror among their courtiers on VE Day 75 years ago, with many fearing stepping out on Buckingham Palace's war-ravaged balcony could put the royals' lives at risk.

articles.description: The first season ended with a cliffhanger – did Jen kill Steve or not? But what is most poignant about the second season is not who killed him, but how well the show deals with grief, writes Charlotte Cripps
